Posted By: pedrodyl (3/7/2012 9:00:08 PM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
Now legal in EDH. Kaalia decks are going to become rather monolithic, lol.  
  
I love the concept of Kaalia, a lot, but really:   
  
[Akroma, Angel of Wrath](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Akroma, Angel of Wrath), [Avacyn, Angel of Hope](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Avacyn, Angel of Hope), [Kokusho, the Evening Star](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Kokusho, the Evening Star), [Gisela, Blade of Goldnight](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Gisela, Blade of Goldnight), [Malfegor](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Malfegor), and [Bladewing the Risen](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Bladewing the Risen) all seem REQUIRED for her deck. I predict about 3 more blocks, tops, counting Return to Ravnica (and yes I know there's a great Angel in there already, which suggests the blocks aren't running out of ways to do outdo each other YET), before the unchallengeable 'Best Angels/Demons/Dragons EVER' is fixed for the next 15 years. I don't see how Kaalia doesn't become a PreBuilt Deck unless some stupid kind of powercreep happens.  
  
[Baneslayer Angel](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Baneslayer Angel) might actually be real metagame tech for White EDH Decks in general in a few years. That would be funny.   
  
EDIT:   
  
Wow. [Utvara Hellkit](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Utvara Hellkit)... [(see all)](javascript:void(0);)
posts.html:
Now legal in EDH. Kaalia decks are going to become rather monolithic, lol.

I love the concept of Kaalia, a lot, but really:

Akroma, Angel of Wrath, Avacyn, Angel of Hope, Kokusho, the Evening Star, Gisela, Blade of Goldnight, Malfegor, and Bladewing the Risen all seem REQUIRED for her deck. I predict about 3 more blocks, tops, counting Return to Ravnica (and yes I know there's a great Angel in there already, which suggests the blocks aren't running out of ways to do outdo each other YET), before the unchallengeable 'Best Angels/Demons/Dragons EVER' is fixed for the next 15 years. I don't see how Kaalia doesn't become a PreBuilt Deck unless some stupid kind of powercreep happens.

Baneslayer Angel might actually be real metagame tech for White EDH Decks in general in a few years. That would be funny.

EDIT:

Wow. Utvara Hellkit... (see all)

Posted By: The.Laughing.Man (7/7/2012 5:18:35 AM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
This card can achieve the fastest possible kill (outside of concession) in the game of magic.   
Here's how it works  
1. Choose to go second.   
2. put [gemstone caverns](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=gemstone caverns) into play   
3. on the first player's upkeep, cast [Flash](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Flash), the blue from your gemstone caverns and remove a [Simian Spirit guide](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Simian Spirit guide), or an [Elvish spirit guide](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Elvish spirit guide) from you hand to generate another mana.  
4. choose to put [protean hulk](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=protean hulk) into play and then promptly sac it.  
5. use the hulk's enters the graveyard ability to go and fetch out your 4 Kukusho's and win the game.
posts.html:
This card can achieve the fastest possible kill (outside of concession) in the game of magic.
Here's how it works
1. Choose to go second.
2. put gemstone caverns into play
3. on the first player's upkeep, cast Flash, the blue from your gemstone caverns and remove a Simian Spirit guide, or an Elvish spirit guide from you hand to generate another mana.
4. choose to put protean hulk into play and then promptly sac it.
5. use the hulk's enters the graveyard ability to go and fetch out your 4 Kukusho's and win the game.
